name: homelab
description: Setup and configuration files for my personal home server and VPS. I used Ansible playbooks to be able to replicate this setup in case I replace the hardware for some reason. I should probably use Nix too.

name: automata
description: automata is a npm package that provides a way to create and manipulate finite automatons based on regular expressions in JavaScript. This project also features a webpage in which the user can create, visualize and test an automaton based on a reg-ex.

name: nrpp
description: nrpp (Non-recursive Predictive Parser) is a npm package that takes a grammar and generates a First, Follow sets, along with a parsing table (M table). This project also features a webpage in which the user can upload a .txt file with a grammar in it (E -> E + T, E -> T, T -> (id), etc.) and obtain both mentioned sets and the table. With this tool you can also test strings against the grammar.
